complete_report.product_analysis: The BALENNZ Athletic Shorts suffer from significant quality control issues, inaccurate sizing, and misleading product descriptions.  Customer satisfaction is extremely low due to these problems.
complete_report.competitor_analysis: Competitors, primarily focusing on women's athletic shorts, generally receive less severe negative feedback regarding quality and sizing.  This highlights the need for BALENNZ to improve its manufacturing processes and product descriptions.
complete_report.recommendations: To improve sales, BALENNZ must prioritize quality control, improve sizing accuracy, upgrade materials, refine the design, and provide accurate product descriptions.  Marketing should highlight these improvements and focus on the value proposition of a high-quality, affordable product.
